title: Drawing, "Various sketches and notations, with date April 5, 1862", 1862
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom ?: April 5 / Coal of Reid.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto: Horizontal composite of various scenes in an army encampment.
Verso: Vertical sketches, a saluting Zouave, probably shown from the back; head is show in profile, at left.  Partially drawn over a "wash" list.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Various sketches and notations, with date April 5, 1862", 1862.
1862. Graphite on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-138.
